### Data Science | Data Storytelling | Location Analytics

<br></br>
Welcome to my personal website! I'm a data scientist and visualization specialist with a social science PhD from Stanford University and quantitative research experience in tech and non-profits.

Data science projects get my analytical and creative juices flowing. I take a user-centered approach to designing visualizations, so that my maps, graphs, and charts not only represent the data, but also inspire my audience to act or change their point-of-view. Learn more about me and my functional, yet artful visualization style by exploring the rest of my site.
